attributes.action: Invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details: Under Article 50 we would have 2 years to negotiate our exit. This is more than enough time. Until then the UK will still be in the EU. How does that serve the democratically expressed will of the British people?
attributes.background: Article 50 is the only way of leaving the EU. Now there has been a vote for Brexit, why prolong the agony?
